verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> vay-Hi, came בִּימֵי֙ <WH3117> bi-Mei And it came to pass in the days אַמְרָפֶ֣ל <WH569> 'am-ra-Fel of Amraphel מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- king שִׁנְעָ֔ר <WH8152> shin-'Ar, of Shinar אַרְי֖וֹךְ <WH746> ar-Yoch Arioch מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech king אֶלָּסָ֑ר <WH495> 'el-la-Sar; of Ellasar כְּדָרְלָעֹ֙מֶר֙ <WH3540> ke-da-re-la-'O-mer Chedorlaomer מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech king עֵילָ֔ם <WH5867> 'ei-Lam, of Elam וְתִדְעָ֖ל <WH8413> ve-tid-'Al and Tidal מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech king גּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> go-Yim. of nations

עָשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> 'a-Su [That these] made מִלְחָמָ֗ה <WH4421> mil-cha-Mah, war אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- with בֶּ֙רַע֙ <WH1298> be-ra' Bera מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech king סְדֹ֔ם <WH5467> se-Dom, of Sodom וְאֶת־ <WH854> ve-'Et and with בִּרְשַׁ֖ע <WH1306> bir-Sha' and with Birsha מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech king עֲמֹרָ֑ה <WH6017> 'a-mo-Rah; of Gomorrah שִׁנְאָ֣ב׀ <WH8134> shin-'Av Shinab מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech king אַדְמָ֗ה <WH126> 'ad-Mah, of Admah וְשֶׁמְאֵ֙בֶר֙ <WH8038> ve-shem-'E-ver and Shemeber מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech king; צְבֹיִים tze-vo-yim כצְבֹויִ֔ים <WH6636> tze-vo-Yim, Zeboiim קוּמֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> u-Me-lech and the king בֶּ֖לַע <WH1106> Be-la' of Bela הִיא־ <WH1931> hi- which is צֹֽעַר׃ <WH6820> Tzo-'ar. Zoar

כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All אֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> 'el-leh these חָֽבְר֔וּ <WH2266> cha-ve-Ru, All these were joined together אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to עֵ֖מֶק <WH6010> 'E-mek in the vale הַשִּׂדִּ֑ים <WH7708> has-sid-Dim; of Siddim ה֖וּא <WH1931> hu which יָ֥ם <WH3220> yam sea הַמֶּֽלַח׃ <WH4417> ham-Me-lach. is the salt

שְׁתֵּ֤ים <WH8147> she-Teim both עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <WH6240> 'es-Reh ten שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> sha-Nah, years עָבְד֖וּ <WH5647> 'a-ve-Du had served אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כְּדָרְלָעֹ֑מֶר <WH3540> ke-da-re-la-'O-mer; Chedorlaomer וּשְׁלֹשׁ־ <WH7969> u-she-losh- three עֶשְׂרֵ֥ה <WH6240> 'es-Reh ten שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> sha-Nah year מָרָֽדוּ׃ <WH4775> ma-Ra-du. they rebelled

וּבְאַרְבַּע֩ <WH702> u-ve-'ar-Ba' four עֶשְׂרֵ֨ה <WH6240> 'es-Reh teen שָׁנָ֜ה <WH8141> sha-Nah year בָּ֣א <WH935> ba came כְדָרְלָעֹ֗מֶר <WH3540> che-da-re-la-'O-mer, Chedorlaomer וְהַמְּלָכִים֙ <WH4428> ve-ham-me-la-Chim and the kings אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher after אִתּ֔וֹ <WH854> it-To, for וַיַּכּ֤וּ <WH5221> vai-yak-Ku that [were] with him and smote אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- רְפָאִים֙ <WH7497> re-fa-'Im the Rephaims בְּעַשְׁתְּרֹ֣ת be-'ash-te-Rot קַרְנַ֔יִם <WH6255> kar-Na-yim, in Ashteroth Karnaim וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַזּוּזִ֖ים <WH2104> haz-zu-Zim and the Zuzims בְּהָ֑ם <WH1990> be-Ham; in Ham וְאֵת֙ <WH853> ve-'Et הָֽאֵימִ֔ים <WH368> ha-'ei-Mim, and the Emims בְּשָׁוֵ֖ה <WH7740> be-sha-Veh Shaveh קִרְיָתָֽיִם׃ <WH7156> kir-ya-Ta-yim. Kiriathaim

וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַחֹרִ֖י <WH2752> ha-cho-Ri And the Horites בְּהַרְרָ֣ם <WH2022> be-har-Ram their Mount שֵׂעִ֑יר <WH8165> se-'Ir; Seir עַ֚ד <WH5704> 'ad far אֵ֣יל 'eil פָּארָ֔ן <WH364> pa-Ran, unto Elparan אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- which [is] by הַמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <WH4057> ham-mid-Bar. the wilderness

וַ֠יָּשֻׁבוּ <WH7725> Vai-ya-shu-vu And they returned וַיָּבֹ֜אוּ <WH935> vai-ya-Vo-'u and came אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to עֵ֤ין 'ein מִשְׁפָּט֙ <WH5880> mish-Pat Enmishpat הִ֣וא <WH1931> hi he קָדֵ֔שׁ <WH6946> ka-Desh, which [is] Kadesh וַיַּכּ֕וּ <WH5221> vai-yak-Ku and smote אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all שְׂדֵ֖ה <WH7704> se-Deh all the country הָעֲמָלֵקִ֑י <WH6003> ha-'a-ma-lei-Ki; of the Amalekites וְגַם֙ <WH1571> ve-Gam and also אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָ֣אֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> ha-'e-mo-Ri, and also the Amorites הַיֹּשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> hai-yo-Shev that dwelt בְּחַֽצְצֹ֥ן be-chatz-Tzon תָּמָֽר׃ <WH2688> ta-Mar. in Hazezontamar

וַיֵּצֵ֨א <WH3318> vai-ye-Tze And there went out מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- the king סְדֹ֜ם <WH5467> se-Dom of Sodom וּמֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> u-Me-lech and the king עֲמֹרָ֗ה <WH6017> 'a-mo-Rah, of Gomorrah וּמֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> u-Me-lech and the king אַדְמָה֙ <WH126> 'ad-Mah of Admah וּמֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> u-Me-lech and the king; צְבֹיִים tze-vo-yim כצְבֹויִ֔ם <WH6636> tze-vo-Yim, Zeboiim קוּמֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> u-Me-lech and the king בֶּ֖לַע <WH1106> Be-la' of Bela הִוא־ <WH1931> hi (the same צֹ֑עַר <WH6820> Tzo-'ar; Zoar וַיַּֽעַרְכ֤וּ <WH6186> vai-ya-'ar-Chu arrayed אִתָּם֙ <WH854> 'it-Tam against מִלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> mil-cha-Mah, battle בְּעֵ֖מֶק <WH6010> be-'E-mek with them in the vale הַשִּׂדִּֽים׃ <WH7708> has-sid-Dim. of Siddim

אֵ֣ת <WH854> 'et against כְּדָרְלָעֹ֜מֶר <WH3540> ke-da-re-la-'O-mer With Chedorlaomer מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech the king עֵילָ֗ם <WH5867> 'ei-Lam, of Elam וְתִדְעָל֙ <WH8413> ve-tid-'Al and with Tidal מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech king גּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> go-Yim, of nations וְאַמְרָפֶל֙ <WH569> ve-'am-ra-Fel and Amraphel מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech king שִׁנְעָ֔ר <WH8152> shin-'Ar, of Shinar וְאַרְי֖וֹךְ <WH746> ve-'ar-Yoch and Arioch מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech king אֶלָּסָ֑ר <WH495> 'el-la-Sar; of Ellasar אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <WH702> 'ar-ba-'Ah four מְלָכִ֖ים <WH4428> me-la-Chim kings אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- against הַחֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH2568> ha-cha-mish-Shah. with five

וְעֵ֣מֶק <WH6010> ve-'E-mek And the vale הַשִׂדִּ֗ים <WH7708> ha-sid-Dim, of Siddim בֶּֽאֱרֹ֤ת <WH875> be-'e-Rot [was full of] בֶּאֱרֹת֙ <WH875> be-'e-Rot pits חֵמָ֔ר <WH2564> che-Mar, of tar וַיָּנֻ֛סוּ <WH5127> vai-ya-Nu-su fled מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- and the kings סְדֹ֥ם <WH5467> se-Dom of Sodom וַעֲמֹרָ֖ה <WH6017> va-'a-mo-Rah and Gomorrah וַיִּפְּלוּ־ <WH5307> vai-yip-pe-lu- and fell שָׁ֑מָּה <WH8033> Sham-mah; who וְהַנִּשְׁאָרִ֖ים <WH7604> ve-han-nish-'a-Rim there and they that remained הֶ֥רָה <WH2022> He-rah to the mountain נָּֽסוּ׃ <WH5127> Na-su. fled

וַ֠יִּקְחוּ <WH3947> Vai-yik-chu And they took אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all רְכֻ֨שׁ <WH7399> re-Chush all the goods סְדֹ֧ם <WH5467> se-Dom of Sodom וַעֲמֹרָ֛ה <WH6017> va-'a-mo-Rah and Gomorrah וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all אָכְלָ֖ם <WH400> 'a-che-Lam and all their victuals וַיֵּלֵֽכוּ׃ <WH1980> vai-ye-Le-chu. and departed

וַיִּקְח֨וּ <WH3947> vai-yik-Chu And they took אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- ל֧וֹט <WH3876> Lot Lot וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et רְכֻשׁ֛וֹ <WH7399> re-chu-Sho and his goods בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- son אֲחִ֥י <WH251> 'a-Chi brother's אַבְרָ֖ם <WH87> 'av-Ram Abram's וַיֵּלֵ֑כוּ <WH1980> vai-ye-Le-chu; and departed וְה֥וּא <WH1931> ve-Hu he יֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> yo-Shev who dwelt בִּסְדֹֽם׃ <WH5467> bis-Dom. in Sodom

וַיָּבֹא֙ <WH935> vai-ya-Vo And there came הַפָּלִ֔יט <WH6412> hap-pa-Lit, one that had escaped וַיַּגֵּ֖ד <WH5046> vai-yag-Ged and told לְאַבְרָ֣ם <WH87> le-'av-Ram Abram הָעִבְרִ֑י <WH5680> ha-'iv-Ri; the Hebrew וְהוּא֩ <WH1931> ve-Hu now he שֹׁכֵ֨ן <WH7931> sho-Chen for he dwelt בְּאֵֽלֹנֵ֜י <WH436> be-'e-lo-Nei in the plain מַמְרֵ֣א <WH4471> mam-Re of Mamre הָאֱמֹרִ֗י <WH567> ha-'e-mo-Ri, the Amorite אֲחִ֤י <WH251> 'a-Chi brother אֶשְׁכֹּל֙ <WH812> 'esh-Kol of Eshcol וַאֲחִ֣י <WH251> va-'a-Chi and brother עָנֵ֔ר <WH6063> 'a-Ner, of Aner וְהֵ֖ם <WH1992> ve-Hem and these בַּעֲלֵ֥י <WH1167> ba-'a-Lei archer בְרִית־ <WH1285> ve-rit- confederacy אַבְרָֽם׃ <WH87> 'av-Ram. with Abram

וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> vai-yish-Ma' heard אַבְרָ֔ם <WH87> 'av-Ram, And when Abram כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for נִשְׁבָּ֖ה <WH7617> nish-Bah was taken captive אָחִ֑יו <WH251> 'a-Chiv; that his brother וַיָּ֨רֶק <WH7324> vai-Ya-rek he armed אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- חֲנִיכָ֜יו <WH2593> cha-ni-Chav his trained יְלִידֵ֣י <WH3211> ye-li-Dei [servants] born בֵית֗וֹ <WH1004> vei-To, in his own house שְׁמֹנָ֤ה <WH8083> she-mo-Nah eight עָשָׂר֙ <WH6240> 'a-Sar teen וּשְׁלֹ֣שׁ <WH7969> u-she-Losh three מֵא֔וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot, hundred וַיִּרְדֹּ֖ף <WH7291> vai-yir-Dof and pursued עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- far דָּֽן׃ <WH1835> Dan. [them] unto Dan

וַיֵּחָלֵ֨ק <WH2505> vai-ye-cha-Lek And he divided עֲלֵיהֶ֧ם׀ <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hem against לַ֛יְלָה <WH3915> Lay-lah by night ה֥וּא <WH1931> hu he וַעֲבָדָ֖יו <WH5650> va-'a-va-Dav himself against them he and his servants וַיַּכֵּ֑ם <WH5221> vai-yak-Kem; and smote וַֽיִּרְדְּפֵם֙ <WH7291> vai-yir-de-Fem them and pursued עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- far חוֹבָ֔ה <WH2327> cho-Vah, them unto Hobah אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which מִשְּׂמֹ֖אל <WH8040> mis-se-Mol which [is] on the left hand לְדַמָּֽשֶׂק׃ <WH1834> le-dam-Ma-sek. of Damascus

וַיָּ֕שֶׁב <WH7725> vai-Ya-shev And he brought back אֵ֖ת <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הָרְכֻ֑שׁ <WH7399> ha-re-Chush; all the goods וְגַם֩ <WH1571> ve-Gam and also אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- ל֨וֹט <WH3876> Lot Lot אָחִ֤יו <WH251> 'a-Chiv his brother וּרְכֻשׁוֹ֙ <WH7399> u-re-chu-Sho and his goods הֵשִׁ֔יב <WH7725> he-Shiv, and also brought again וְגַ֥ם <WH1571> ve-Gam and also אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַנָּשִׁ֖ים <WH802> han-na-Shim and the women וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> ha-'Am. also and the people

וַיֵּצֵ֣א <WH3318> vai-ye-Tze went out מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- And the king סְדֹם֮ <WH5467> se-Dom of Sodom לִקְרָאתוֹ֒ <WH7125> lik-ra-To to meet אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei him after שׁוּב֗וֹ <WH7725> shu-Vo, his return מֵֽהַכּוֹת֙ <WH5221> me-hak-kOt from the slaughter אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כְּדָר־ ke-dor- לָעֹ֔מֶר <WH3540> la-'O-mer, of Chedorlaomer וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַמְּלָכִ֖ים <WH4428> ham-me-la-Chim and of the kings אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who אִתּ֑וֹ <WH854> it-To; for אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- at עֵ֣מֶק <WH6010> 'E-mek that [were] with him at the valley שָׁוֵ֔ה <WH7740> sha-Veh, of Shaveh ה֖וּא <WH1931> hu which עֵ֥מֶק <WH6010> 'E-mek dale הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech. [is] the king's

וּמַלְכִּי־ u-mal-ki- צֶ֙דֶק֙ <WH4442> tze-dek And Melchizedek מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech king שָׁלֵ֔ם <WH8004> sha-Lem, of Salem הוֹצִ֖יא <WH3318> ho-Tzi brought forth לֶ֣חֶם <WH3899> Le-chem bread וָיָ֑יִן <WH3196> va-Ya-yin; and wine וְה֥וּא <WH1931> ve-Hu now he כֹהֵ֖ן <WH3548> cho-Hen and he [was] the priest לְאֵ֥ל <WH410> le-'El God עֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <WH5945> el-Yon. of the most high

וַֽיְבָרְכֵ֖הוּ <WH1288> vay-va-re-Che-hu And he blessed וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> vai-yo-Mar; him and said בָּר֤וּךְ <WH1288> ba-Ruch Blessed אַבְרָם֙ <WH87> 'av-Ram [be] Abram לְאֵ֣ל <WH410> le-'El God עֶלְי֔וֹן <WH5945> el-Yon, of the most high קֹנֵ֖ה <WH7069> ko-Neh possessor שָׁמַ֥יִם <WH8064> sha-Ma-yim of heaven וָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> va-'A-retz. and earth

וּבָרוּךְ֙ <WH1288> u-va-ruCh And blessed אֵ֣ל <WH410> 'el God עֶלְי֔וֹן <WH5945> el-Yon, be the most high אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- Who מִגֵּ֥ן <WH4042> mig-Gen which hath delivered צָרֶ֖יךָ <WH6862> tza-Rei-cha thine enemies בְּיָדֶ֑ךָ <WH3027> be-ya-De-cha; into thy hand וַיִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> vai-yit-ten- And he gave ל֥וֹ lo מַעֲשֵׂ֖ר <WH4643> ma-'a-Ser him tithes מִכֹּֽל׃ <WH3605> mik-Kol. of all

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- And the king סְדֹ֖ם <WH5467> se-Dom of Sodom אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to אַבְרָ֑ם <WH87> 'av-Ram; unto Abram תֶּן־ <WH5414> ten- Give לִ֣י li הַנֶּ֔פֶשׁ <WH5315> han-Ne-fesh, me the persons וְהָרְכֻ֖שׁ <WH7399> ve-ha-re-Chush the goods קַֽח־ <WH3947> kach- and take לָֽךְ׃ Lach.

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said אַבְרָ֖ם <WH87> 'av-Ram And Abram אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech to the king סְדֹ֑ם <WH5467> se-Dom; of Sodom הֲרִימֹ֨תִי <WH7311> ha-ri-Mo-ti I have lift up יָדִ֤י <WH3027> ya-Di mine hand אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֵ֣ל <WH410> 'el God עֶלְי֔וֹן <WH5945> el-Yon, the most high קֹנֵ֖ה <WH7069> ko-Neh the possessor שָׁמַ֥יִם <WH8064> sha-Ma-yim of heaven וָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> va-'A-retz. and earth
